name: Reaping Havoc
description:
Reaping Havoc is a top-down shooter where you play as death itself, and you're taking matters into your own bony hands.  this game was made as a part of the Global Game Jam 2022

This game focuses on the duality of life and death. At any time, the player can enter the spirit realm to capture the souls of the mortals they've slain to regain health. Please do post your high score in the Game Jam Chat! 

The game contains a How-to-play in the main menu, but, for reference: 

W A S D: Move Grim around 

Spacebar: Enter the Spirit Realm 

Mouse 1: Throw Scythes 

Enter the spirit realm and collect the souls of the dead to regain HP.

Credits to Joshua McLean for the BGM: http://mrjoshuamclean.com
